Welcome to the world of Mario
Hero of the Mushroom Kingdom, known for his bravery and ability to rescue Princess Peach. He is an iconic plumber with his signature red hat.

"Abilities: -Jumps high and with precision. -Brave hero of the Mushroom Kingdom. -Ability to use power-ups like the Super Mushroom, Fire Flower, and Cape. -Great determination to rescue Peach and face Bowser."
Mario\'s younger brother, somewhat shy but equally brave. He stands out with his green hat and is taller than Mario.

"Abilities: -Jumps higher than Mario, but with less control. -Expert in facing ghosts thanks to his Poltergust vacuum cleaner. -Loyal and sometimes shy brother, but determined in critical situations. -Can slide slightly when falling due to his jumping style."
Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, often captured by Bowser, but also brave and determined to protect her kingdom.

"Abilities: -Can float in the air for a few seconds with her dress. -Smart and strategic in times of danger. -Controls the power of the Heart in some games, using it for defense or attack. -Brave protector of the Mushroom Kingdom."
Inhabitant of the Mushroom Kingdom and loyal servant of Peach, recognizable by his red hat with white spots. He is a helpful ally in many adventures.

"Abilities: -Great speed and strength when carrying objects. -Reliable servant always willing to help. -Has knowledge of the Mushroom Kingdom and its secrets. -Loyal and optimistic even in the worst situations."
